title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.37 - Ordering from extra security officer lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.37 - Ordering from extra security officer lists

State Regulations

After all individuals on the regular security officer lists
are employed, the company shall employ qualified individuals from the extra
security officer list in accordance with their seniority classification with
the employer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.37

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
